sqlQuery.name: Organisms
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct oa.source_id from apidbTuning.OrganismAttributes oa, apidb.Organism o where oa.component_taxon_id = o.taxon_id

sqlQuery.name: OrganismAlias
sqlQuery.sql: select source_id, source_id as old_source_id from apidbTuning.OrganismAttributes

sqlQuery.name: organismAttrs
sqlQuery.sql: select oa.source_id, oa.species, oa.organism_name AS organism_full, oa. organism_name AS organism, oa.organism_name AS hyperlinkName, decode(genome_source, 'gb', 'GenBank', 'jkissinger', 'Kissinger Lab', genome_source) as data_source, genome_dataset.genome_dataset_id from apidbTuning.OrganismAttributes oa, (select oa.source_id, dsp.description, dsp.dataset_presenter_id as genome_dataset_id from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter dsp, apidbTuning.DatasetNameTaxon dnt, apidbTuning.OrganismAttributes oa where dsp.type = 'genome' and dsp.dataset_presenter_id = dnt.dataset_presenter_id and oa.component_taxon_id = dnt.taxon_id) genome_dataset where genome_dataset.source_id = oa.source_id(+)

sqlQuery.name: Organisms
sqlQuery.sql: select source_id, organism_name AS organism from apidbTuning.OrganismAttributes

sqlQuery.name: GenomeSequencingAndAnnotation
sqlQuery.sql: select oa.source_id, dsp.description from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter dsp, apidbTuning.DatasetNameTaxon dnt, apidbTuning.OrganismAttributes oa where dsp.type = 'genome' and dsp.dataset_presenter_id = dnt.dataset_presenter_id and oa.component_taxon_id = dnt.taxon_id
